noise: LexisNexis AI launches 'Drafting Assistant Pro,' integrates GenAI for brief synthesis & argument generation.
translation: Your associates can now produce near-final legal briefs in minutes, not hours, by leveraging AI. This means faster client delivery and lower research costs, not just incremental gains.
action: I've seen 'automation' tools promise this since the 90s. This isn't just word processing. I can design a pilot program to integrate this into your litigation workflow, including critical human oversight and training, ready in 3-5 days.
